page.title: 19Family Life
page.content: Saturday the 1st of June started for me at 9.00 am. My dad was already outside working on the farm, and mum was doing the washing. She made breakfast of boiled egg and toast. My mum wanted to do some small bits of shopping in Castle-Douglas so my sister and I decided we would go swimming there. We had our lunch in town. We went back home and planned to go to Dumfries. This was around 1.00 pm. My mum did the big week's shopping in Presto's. We bought my sister a new pair of shoes in Dumfries, went to see my Gran in hospital. On our way home (this was around 6.00 pm), we bought fish and chip suppers for eating at home. The rest of the night was spent watching T.V. (I watched Kenny Everett then Dynasty and then I watched Cheers). I went to bed at 10.30 pm.
